title: HOW CAN I PLAY CUSTOM WITH BOTS ON NEW CLIENT?
body: i wanted to experiment with some builds and stuff but i cant do a custom game with bots

replies.body: ^  This feature is currently planned for patch 7.1. Until then, you'll need to launch the legacy client to play a custom game with bots.

After you experiment with those builds though, what are you gonna do? Remember them? Write them down? They are removing the custom item set creator from the new client, so unless you have an incredible memory your experimentation will most likely stay in that bot game, especially if it turns out you must play a few games before trying it out for real.
